job.title: Machine Learning / Deep Learning Engineer
job.description: at toyota research institute tri were working to build a future where everyone has the freedom to move engage and explore with a focus on reducing vehicle collisions injuries and fatalities join us in our mission to improve the quality of human life through advances in artificial intelligence automated driving robotics and materials science were dedicated to building a world of mobility for all where everyone regardless of age or ability can live in harmony with technology to enjoy a better life through innovations in ai well helpltbrgtltulgtltligt develop vehicles incapable of causing a crash regardless of the actions of the driverltligtltligt develop technology for vehicles and robots to help people enjoy new levels of independence access and mobilityltligtltligt bring advanced mobility technology to market fasterltligtltligt discover new materials that will make batteries and hydrogen fuel cells smaller lighter less expensive and more powerfulltligtltligt develop humancentered ai systems to augment not replace human decision making to increase the quality of decisions eg mitigate cognitive biases andor to facilitate faster innovation cyclesltbrgtltligtltulgtour work is guided by a dedication to safety in both what we research and how we perform our research our goal is to benefit society as a subsidiary of toyota tri is fueled by a diverse and inclusive community of people who carry invaluable leadership experience and ideas from industryleading companies over half of our technical team carries phd degrees were continually searching for the worlds best talent people who are ready to define the new world of mobility with usltbrgtltbrgtwe strive to build a company that helps our people thrive achieve worklife balance and bring their best selves to work at tri you will have the opportunity to enjoy the best of both worlds a fun environment with forwardthinking people who enjoy solving tough problems and the financial backing to successfully achieve our goals come work with tri if youre interested in transforming mobility through designing technology for safer cars enabling the elderly to age in place or designing alternative fuel sources start your impossible with usltbrgtltbrgtour machine learning ml team is looking for worldclass research scientists and engineers to turn toyotas data advantage into an ai advantage as the car maker in the world with million cars on the road today we can learn from massive amounts of data to realize safe automated driving on a global scale our teams mission is to use all the data to identify and solve open research problems on the critical path to automated driving we are working on some of the hardest challenges in the area of perception eg scene understanding d vision tracking prediction eg handling uncertainty predicting human behavior trajectory forecasting planning eg understanding and reacting to human intent multiagent modeling and general machine learning eg selfsupervised learning imitation learning active learning multitask learning domain adaptation robustness to the heavy tail of edge cases efficient deep learning large scale distributed training we invent new deep learning algorithms that can leverage massive amounts of data labeled or not experimentally showing stateoftheart performance both in internal benchmarks and public ones publishing at top machine learning and computer vision conferences and collaborating with our university partners we work closely with other teams at tri to transfer and ship our most successful algorithms and models towards worldscale longterm autonomyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt responsibilities ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtas a machine learning engineer you will contribute to stateoftheart machine learning infrastructure and relevant software eg distributed training continuous model integration data management and evaluation at unparalleled scale you will implement cuttingedge deep learning models accelerating model training time improving performance and tackling open problems together with research scientists last but not least you will deploy your algorithms and models in our selfdriving test vehicles and beyond responsibilities and required qualifications are as followsltbrgtltulgtltligtbuild machine learning models using deep learning techniques for computer vision tasks such as semantic segmentation object detection video understanding etcltligtltligtaddress large scale challenges in the machine learning development cycle especially around distributed training in the cloud and data engineeringltligtltligtmanipulate highvolume highdimensionality structured data from driving logs for training and testing deep networksltligtltligtproduce high quality tested code that enables large scale research and can be transferred to physical robots deployed in the real worldltligtltligtstay up to date on the stateoftheart in deep learning ideas and software in collaboration with our research scientistsltligtltligtwork in a multidisciplinary team and collaborate with other teams across the companyltligtltligtpresent results in verbal and written communications including potentially at top international conferencesltligtltulgtqualificationsltbrgtltulgtltligtbachelors degree in computer science math physics or related fieldltligtltligtproficient in python and unix is a minimum additional knowledge of c cuda is a plus experience with aws as wellltligtltligtgood software engineering skills grounded in principled best practicesltligtltligtclear grasp on basic linear algebra optimization statistics and algorithmsltligtltligtdeep learning and computer vision expertise not required but recommended familiarity with pytorch or other deep learning frameworks is a bonusltligtltligtyou are passionate about ml both large scale engineering and research challenges especially in the space of automated driving ltligtltligtyou are a reliable teamplayer you like to think big and go deeper you care about openness and delivering with integrityltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggt basic requirements ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtbachelors with at least years of experience masters with at least years of experience phd with at least year of experienceltligtltligtstrong software engineering practices in python with machine learning experience in a production setting ltligtltligtdeep learning expertise experience training deeplearning models in an endtoend fashion and writing custom layersoperationsltligtltligtexperience working with pytorch tensorflow or other modern deep learning frameworks ltligtltligtmultiview geometry and multimodal reasoning familiar with multisensor geometry sensor intrinsics extrinsics multimodal sensor fusion point cloud processing etcltligtltligtfamiliar with pydata ecosystem including numpy scipy pandas sklearn etc and comfortable with development in linux ltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggt bonus points ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtwritten custom neuralnetwork nn layers cuda operations that use pytorchtensorflow share snippets if you canltligtltligtimplemented stateoftheart models from research papers share coderepos if you canltligtltligtexperience with largescale distributed training nn optimization distillation quantization compression ltligtltligtexperience with perception prediction andor planning stacks for roboticsavsltligtltligtpublication in roboticsmlcv conference icra iros iv dv cvpr eccv iccv icml neuripsltbrgtltligtltulgtplease reference this candidate privacy notice to inform you of the categories of personal information that we collect from individuals who inquire about andor apply to work for toyota research institute inc or its subsidiaries including toyota ai ventures gp lp and the purposes for which we use such personal informationltbrgtltbrgttri provides equal employment opportunity without regard to the applicants race color creed gender gender identity or expression sexual orientation national origin age physical or mental disability medical condition religion marital status genetic information veteran status or any other status protected under federal state or local laws
